header_text: Your spouse offers to help you pay a bill online. As you sit with them, you can't remember the login details for your accounts. You are embarrassed, but you know your spouse is not judgmental.

elements.name: Your spouse offers to help you pay a bill online. As you sit with them, you can't remember the login details for your accounts. You are embarrassed, but you know your spouse is not judgmental._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
